name: Slime Family
description:
This is a small game made for the Godot Wild Jam #24 ( Family).

Controls:

To move: WASD  (or ZQSD).

To interact with elements and menus while at Home: mouse click.

The goal is to create the strongest family by creating baby slimes to boost your pet 's stats.

Collect magic orbs in the world by destroying magic trees and enemies.

I used the wildcards "Hidden Passage" and "Pet the Dog" :
